Reference

All functions

AlignPlots()

Align multiple ggplot graphs, taking into account the legend

add_CI()

Add pointwise Confidence Interval to a an object created by visR through an S3 method

add_CNSR()

Add censoring symbols to a visR ggplot through an S3 method

add_annotation()

Wrapper around ggplot2::annotation_custom for simplified annotation to ggplot2 plots

add_risktable()

Add risk tables to visR plots through an S3 method

adtte

adtte

brca_cohort

Cancer survival data

estimate_KM()

Wrapper for Kaplan Meier analysis for an ADaM Basic Data Structure (BDS) for Time-to-Event analysis

get_COX_HR()

Summarize Hazard Ratio from a survival object using S3 method

get_pvalue()

Summarize the test for equality across strata from a survival object using S3 method

get_quantile()

Extended quantile S3 method - EXPERIMENTAL NEEDS TESTING AND COMPARING WITH SAS SOFTWARE

get_risktable()

Create Risk Table

get_summary()

Summarize the descriptive statistics across strata from a survival object using S3 method

get_tableone()

#' Create Summary Table (also known as 'tableone')

legendopts()

Translates options for legend into a list that can be passed to ggplot2

plot()

Create a ggplot directly from an object through an S3 method

render()

Render a dataframe or tibble

style_visR()

Add visR theme to ggplot chart

summarize()

Calculate summary statistics for a vector

summarize(<default>)

Create variable summary for all other variable types

summarize(<factor>)

Create variable summary for factors

summarize(<integer>)

Create variable summary for numeric variables

summarize(<numeric>)

Create variable summary for numeric variables

summarize_tab1()

Create abbreviated variable summary for table1

summarize_tab1(<default>)

Create variable summary for all other variable types

summarize_tab1(<factor>)

Create variable summary for factors

summarize_tab1(<integer>)

Create variable summary for integer variables

summarize_tab1(<numeric>)

Create variable summary for numeric variables

table_caption()

Create a caption for any table

table_download()

Create a caption for any table

tableone()

Summary Table (Table One)

the_lhs()

Find the "lhs" in the pipeline

tidyme()

Extended tidy cleaning of selected objects using S3 method

vr_attrition_table()

vr_plt_forest()

Render a simple forest plot given a tibble This is an experimental function that may be developed over time.

vr_tidy_rbest()
